# ducker

<!-- badges: start -->
[![commits](https://badgen.net/github/commits/rsund/ducker/main?icon=github&color=green)](https://github.com/rsund/ducker/commits/main)
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/rsund/ducker/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/rsund/ducker/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ducker is to provide a selection of helper functions to ease the use 
of the DuckDB database management system in R.

## Installation

You can install the development version of ducker from [R-universe](https://https://rsund.r-universe.dev/) with:

``` r
# Enable universe(s) by rsund
options(repos = c(
  rsund = 'https://rsund.r-universe.dev',
  CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org',
  options()$repos))

# Install the package
install.packages('ducker')

```
